scripts.profile: emcc -I external_libs/eigen-3.4.0 -I external_libs/RedSVD/ src/main.cpp --bind -s PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE=25 -pthread -O2 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 --profiling && mv a.out* public/ && vite
scripts.buildwasm: emcc -I external_libs/eigen-3.4.0 -I external_libs/RedSVD/ src/main.cpp --bind -s PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE=25 -pthread -O2 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 && mv a.out* public/
